Gentlemen
Please note that we have today up-dated our web site. You will find an Invitation to a Meeting in London with Fujishiro Tatsuya (feel free to download this) as well as our response to the Home Office regarding the proposed ban on "Samurai swords" in the UK. This is under the Members Area. Also a Nakajima Rai school katana has been added to our UK Sword Register. The site is at www.To-ken.com I welcome all criticism and comments.
Regards
Clive Sinclaire
